definition: to maintain the land (with rotation of crops or fertilizer)
to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: I think a month at a health resort will do you good.
sentences.chinese: 我看，到疗养地去住一个月对你有好处。
你好，这是温泉疗养地吗？

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the characteristics and effects of convalescent factors in Lushan.
sentences.chinese: 目的调查分析庐山疗养地自然疗养因子特点及作用。

sentences.english: Bath in Britain is Eruope's famous spa town.
sentences.chinese: 英国的巴思是欧洲著名的矿泉疗养地。

sentences.english: Penelope: You broke your arm in the spa.
sentences.chinese: 你在矿泉疗养地摔伤了胳膊。

sentences.english: A heavy fog had suddenly enveloped the Presidential retreat.
sentences.chinese: 大雾突然笼罩了总统的休养地。

sentences.english: Objectives To investigate the climatic salutary factors in Dujiangyan salutarium.
sentences.chinese: 目的调查都江堰疗养地气候疗养因子情况。

definition: to breed (livestock, fish, crops etc)/to grow/to raise
fat/fertile/loose-fitting or large/to fertilize/to become rich by illegal means/fertilizer/manure
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
